body: Hi Nicole, 1. Can you connect "Honeybe_honeybee" and also "Ladybug_ladybug" components to a panel?   And please upload messages here. like this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*ix1zXEQDKPwtL4OrORr1KIRlwyw*5ILwjzBDDcLsEwW-IQwKQILNC9wmJspXba5TIZJmkuN4kfvXL-Y5rKWIcRbcFdHbqEm/Capture.PNG) messages tell you what are missed or need to resolve. 2. probably you need download the source file manually and copy it to Ladybug's default folder. It should be "c:\ladybug" or  "C:\Users\%USERNAME%\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug", best -Omid
